text: Harvey Smith (born June 2, 1945) is an American politician in the state of Vermont. He is a member of the Vermont House of Representatives, sitting as a Republican from the Addison-5 district, having been first elected in 2010. He also previously served from 1999 to 2006.https://legislature.vermont.gov/people/single/2018.1/15785 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Vermont House of Representatives Category:Vermont Republicans
title: Harvey Smith (American politician)
